import React,{useCallback, useState} from 'react' import {Form,Col,Button,Row} from 'react-bootstrap' import Link from 'next/link' import styled from 'styled-components' import useInput from '../hooks/useInput' import {useDispatch} from 'react-redux' import { loginRequestAction } from '../reducers/user' const FormLabel = styled(Form.Label)` padding: 10px; ` const LoginForm = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const [email, onChangeEmail] = useInput(''); const [password, onChangePassword] = useInput(''); const onSubmitHandler = useCallback( () => { dispatch(loginRequestAction({email,password})) }, [email,password] ); return (
Email Password
) } export default LoginForm
